text: Everyone should be well aware of the issues with these. If you have too much weight the legs slide out and you lose bodies and glass. The 3k can not safely hold 3kg. But I use it with about 1kg max and it works wonderfully and I couldn't be happier. I use this almost everyday and it's so great for vloggers on the go. We have a channel, Chestnut Oaks Homestead, where we are constantly outside doing work and don't want to lug a real tripod around and have to change plates. We can hold this and quickly spread the legs and set it down or attach to trees, tractors, fences, you name it.
label: Positive
